scripts.start-midway: doppler run -c mordecai_midway-dental-group -p mordecai -- turbo start --filter midway-dental-group
scripts.start-dnt: doppler run -c mordecai_dnt-dental-lab -p mordecai -- turbo start --filter dnt-dental-lab
scripts.build-dnt: doppler run -c mordecai_dnt-dental-lab -p mordecai -- turbo build --filter dnt-dental-lab
